Author: GitHub
Description:
"We're just such a small library, hidden in the big applications." In this powerful clip, Log4j maintainer Christian Grobmeier shares the shock and disbelief he felt when Log4Shell was discovered. It's a critical lesson about the invisible, foundational code the world relies on.

#Log4Shell #OpenSource #Security

Title: The open source risk no one talks about
